title: Components
description: A named registry for reusable API definition objects (schemas, responses, parameters, examples, requestBodies, headers, securitySchemes, links, callbacks) that enables $ref referencing throughout the specification. Component entries are not rendered directly — they must be referenced by operations, parameters, or schemas to take effect. Component name keys must match the pattern ^[a-zA-Z0-9.\-_]+$ per OpenAPI 3.0 — arbitrary strings are not valid component identifiers.
